title: How to Save Telegram Gifs on Android

steps.title: Open Telegram.
steps.content: Open Telegram. It’s the blue circle with a white paper airplane inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the conversation with the GIF you want to save.
steps.content: Tap the conversation with the GIF you want to save.

steps.title: Scroll to the GIF you want to save.
steps.content: Scroll to the GIF you want to save.

steps.title: Tap ⁝ on the GIF.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ on the GIF. It’s at the GIF’s top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Save to GIFs.
steps.content: Tap Save to GIFs . The GIF is now saved to your GIFs folder in Telegram. To use the GIF in a conversation, tap the emoji icon at the bottom-left corner of the screen, tap GIF , then select the GIF.
